name: Mission Allergic
description:
Originally released on 7/4/2017. This game was made for Summer UE4 Jam in five days. The theme of the jam was "Blessing in Disguise".

You have to infiltrate a hideout of cat bandits... And you are allergic to cats! Will your constant sneezing blow your cover? Could it actually help you on your mission?

Platforms:

Windows

Third-party assets used:

oldedgar - Sneeze AC 3
martian - footstep-on-wood-foley
Walking In A Mud Puddle from YouTube Audio Library
Arvin61r58 - Splat 15 (NicholasJudy456)
Animations from Mixamo

Team:

Dmitry Seregin (https://twitter.com/terzalo) - Programming, Game Design, 3D Modelling
Alina Israfilova (http://alinaisrafilova.tumblr.com/) - Character Design, 2D Art
Scadinaut  (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMVmnG6-TWjaEqnbMZX6cEQ) - Music, Sound Design
